item.title: Automating Microsoft Sentinel: A blog series on enabling Smart Security
item.description: Learn how to use automation tools and techniques to make your security operations awesome right away with Microsoft Sentinel. Welcome to the fourth entry of our blog series on automating Microsoft Sentinel. My apologies for how long it has taken to get this post completed and published. In this series, we’re showing you how to automate various aspects of Microsoft Sentinel, from simple automation of Sentinel Alerts and Incidents, to more complicated response scenarios with multiple moving parts.
